job.description: ltpgtltstronggtJob DescriptionltstronggtltpgtltpgtSales ConsultantltpgtltpgtUpscale Luxury Retailer looking for parttime portrait sales consultant located in Greenwich CTltpgtltpgtA wellestablished Portrait Artist looking for a dynamic person to consummate the sale of art pieces Sales to take place either in our studio Candidate must be well versed in home design and decoratingltpgtltpgtApplicant mustltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspComfortable dealing with the affluentltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbsp5 years of sales experienceltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspProfessional appearanceltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspStrong communications skillsltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspHave reliable transportationltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspDetailed orientedltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspBe able to work Wedensday thru SaturdaysltpgtltpgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAll clients are provided No Solicitation requiredampnbspltstronggtSalary plus commissions and paid benefits Total yearly compensation between 100000125000ltstronggtltpgtltpgtDO NOT CALL THE STUDIOltpgtltpgtltstronggtMUST SUBMIT COVER LETTER AND RESUME FOR CONSIDERATIONltstronggtltpgtltpgtStudio website wwwkramerportraitscomltpgt
